com.d2c.util

Class TerminalCaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.d2c.util.TerminalCaller

  • public class TerminalCaller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is designed to emulate the Linux terminal.

        public static void saveFile(java.lang.String user,
                            java.lang.String path,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String contents)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Saves a file to a specific path on the file system and creates any required folder hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        user - The owner of the file
        path - The path to the file on the file system
        name - The name of the file
        contents - The contents of the file to be saved
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs
